Description: Fragment of oval handle at neck join of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine light brown; cream slip. Rectangular stamp with rose symbol.
Curator's comments: Name Sosilas. An example in the Benaki collection, Alexandria Museum, and one from Delos are from the same die.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (245)
